name: Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday
name_original: Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday
description:
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday is an educational puzzle game developed by Lazy Games. It was originally released in 2007. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday is available on PC.
